<link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/styles/leaflet.css" />
<style>
    body, html {
      margin: 0;
      padding: 0;
      height: 100%;
      overflow: hidden; /* Hide scrollbars */
    }
    #map {
      height: calc(100vh - 80px) !important; 
      margin-top: -40px !important;
      width: 100%;
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
    }
    h1.title, .title.h1 {
    margin-top: 0;
    margin-bottom: 0;
    padding-bottom: 0px;
    font-size: 0.9rem;
    display: none;
    }
    footer {
    z-index: 1000;
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    margin: 0 0 auto auto;
    max-height: 200px;
    }
    @media (min:width: 768px) {
        .nav-footer-right {
            display: block;
        }
    }
  </style>

<div id="fullscreen-map-wrapper">
<div id="controls">
<label for="regionFilter">Filter by Region:</label>
<select id="regionFilter">
    <option value="">All</option>
</select>

<fieldset>
  <legend><strong>Layer Type</strong></legend>
  <label><input type="checkbox" class="layerCheckbox" value="counties" checked> Counties</label>
  <label><input type="checkbox" class="layerCheckbox" value="schools" checked> Schools</label>
  <label><input type="checkbox" class="layerCheckbox" value="clinics" checked> Clinics</label>
  <label><input type="checkbox" class="layerCheckbox" value="parkruns" checked> Park Runs</label><br>
  <button type="button" id="selectAllBtn">Deselect All</button>
</fieldset>     
</div>
<button id="toggleSidebar">â˜° Filters</button>
<div id="map"></div>                       
</div>

<script type="text/plain" cookie-consent="strictly-necessary" src="https://unpkg.com/leaflet/dist/leaflet.js"></script>
